1.content: Just to start off, pick a character's feet to have some fun with. Doesn't have to be only that character, but should start off with them!
1.title: Beginning!

11.content: Start off with some obvious ones.
11.title: Students

111.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: Use your quirk to "enhanced" this experience!
Oh, what luck! Katsuki comes in the classroom.
111.content:
Your name is Shunko Watanabe, and you're currently attending good ol' Aldera Junior High. You're a part of Katsuki Bakugo's group. Things are going great for you and the guys. You and the guys are either being annoyances and just loitering.

You're truly living the high life.

But one particular day after school, you spot the powerless nerd inside a vacant classroom. He is doing what he's usually doing. Writing in that stupid journal of his.

You stare at those red sneakers with hunger. It's time scratch that "itch" of yours once and for all!

"Still working on that dumbass journal eh Deku." The Bully harshly chided at the nerd. The green haired loser turned to you with a fearful dread in his heart.

'Oh Sh-shunko-san I-I was only…"

"Like I give a shit about what you were doing Deku. Put your feet on the desk."

"Excuse me…but what did you just say-"

"Did I fucking stutter?"

That remark quickly shut the poor boy up, as frantically nodded and what he's told to do. His clunky sneakers fidget nervously as he looks at the bully with confusion clearly written on his face.

Shunko grinned, as he eagerly grabs the shoes, and eagerly removed them, and this revealing Deku's socks. The Bully took a good look at the tongue and saw the number sixteen on them. He lets an impressed whistle that gives Izuku an embarrassed grimace and pink blush on his freckled face.

"Goddamn Deku, I know you have big ass clods. But I never would have thought they would be this big!" Shunko happily mocked the embarrassed shrub, and he anticlimactically. dropped the footwear. He stared at nerd's socks, they were stained with a sickly grey and noxious yellow. He grabbed the socks by the ankle and proceeded slowly strips them off.

Izuku's pale feet are plump and thick. And combined with his fat medium sized toes wiggling ever so slightly has made your boner reached its full painful potential.

What happens next?
111.title: The Nerd always loses

1111.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
1111.content:
Shunko's fingers slowly caressed the pale feet before him. It was simply fascinating that a boy has such soft foot skin. His nail gently scraped against the nerd's more firmer heels. No need to bust out his quirk or do any of the spicy stuff, patience is a virtue after all.

"Please…Sh..hunko..stop this," A blushing Izuku shakily wheezed as the bully's hands pressed against his…um slighty bigger than average feet. It was a such a weird…but definitely nice feeling, it was causing the poor boy's mind to be flustered.

"Ya know Deku, you look pretty cute and your feet are certainly sexy.…okay it's official Me and you are now boyfriend." Shunko coyly said as his thumbs pressed down on the moist midstep. He must have 24/7 access to these feet! And…he..finds the powerless nerd pretty damn cute okay!

Izuku predictably nodded to his…first boyfriend with a mad blush. His submissive nature and habits have such a tight hold on him.

Shunko snickered in triumphant and leans close to Izuku's scared face. There he plants a short kiss on the nerd's soft lips, causing the quirkless boy's mind to be completely frazzled. The Bully quietly removes his face and give Izumi a naughty smirk. "Let's kick it up a notch, shall we?"

Shunko snickered as he...
1111.title: Like something out of a fanfiction

11111.content:
Shunko pulled up a chair in front of Izuku's desk. The teen sat down and took in the sight of the greenete's flushed face between his large soles.

The new boyfriend brought his face to the right sole, taking in the various specks of grim embedded in the thick sole and the thin drops of sweat trailing down to the heel. Shunko took a big whiff of the smell and felt his legs squeeze as his dick harden. The boy began panting as a thick blush appeared on his face.

Izuku's feet had the salty scent of sweat that burned his nostrils and that chessy odor from not changing one's socks for a long time.

"Shunko-kun! Are you ok?", Izuku's sickeningly sweet voice called out as he saw Shunko's red face.

The teen simply smirked as he licked his lips. "You're real lucky Deku, it takes a lot to get feet like this!"

Izuku let out a confused grunt before gasping as Shunko planted his whole face against his foot. He let out a whimper as the sensation of having his feet worshiped came over him.

Shunko hummed as the plump flesh surrounded his face. The squishy sole squelched and jammed the salty sweat to only be eagerly licked up by Shunko. The bully hummed as he rubbed the foot with his face.

'This is the life.'

What's next?
11111.title: Getting Upclose and Personal

111112.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
111112.content:
Like a sticker peeling off a wall, Shunko removed his face with a slight plop. His reddened face is slick with lovely sweat. He huffed as fresh air makes a slow return to his lungs, While down below, his crotch made ever so little twitches. The pressure was building up in it was building up quite nicely. He almost wants to release it all right now…

But he can't! Not just yet.

With a mischievous smirk, the swirls of his fingers shined a dim white. They eagerly caressed the greenette's wide midsteps to his arches.

"Shunko-chan…should you be using your quirk? I-it is against the rules to do so…" Izuku blushed as a strange warmth gently radiated throughout his body. It oddly…soothing. It was an irony that one of his former bullies was making him this way.

"Psh...Deku, no one is here to stop us. You oughta live a little." The bully in question rolled his eyes, the nerd always such goody two shoes. Shunko's little frown quickly turned upside down as his quirk starting to take effect

Izuku…
111112.title: Some different fun

choices: How about i give these guys a rub?"
Start stepping on me would you?"
1111122.content:
As Izuku blushed at the warm feeling going through his body, a new energy came over him causing him to blink in confusion.

Shunko widly grinned as he activated his quirk, feeling the energy flow from his fingers into the plump sweaty soles. The boy's quirk was a growth one in particular he was able to increase the height and muscle mass on living organisms. He often did his gang a favor and temporarily gave them a few feet in height. Though this time it was for his enjoyment.

Izuku felt his limbs and stomach bulk up, he groaned as he was feeling an ache from the strange energy. The freckled boy however was distracted from the pain as Shunko kissed his lips once again.

The bully hummed as he whispered. "Relax Deku, just a little more and you'll like your new features."

Izuku soon began glowing as Shunko's quirk activated, his uniform began to feel tighter strangely as if his body was pushing against it. Izuku yelled out surprised as suddenly his shirt ripped and his black jacket came undone. Now visible were a pair of large pecs being hugged by his jacket.

"W-What?!", Izuku internally yelled as he was now sporting pecs and following them beneath a six pack of abs formed.

The seat below Izuku began to creak as the greenette's bubbly butt grew along with his body. Soon with a crash Izuku fell to the floor, flattening the ruined chair.

Shunko smirked as he ceased his quirk, he wasn't sure how giant he could make something but 8 ft was a good start. Izuku's larger and more buff body was miraculously still clothed safe for his sleeves shredded due to his large biceps and the ankles of his pants now going up to his shins.

"U-um Shunko this is your quirk?", Izuku awkwardly said as he tried getting use to the new muscle mass weighing down his body.

"Damn Deku, your spot on! Thought you and your stompers needed a change, gotta say I'm enjoying it.", Shunko chuckled as he crouched down in front of the soles now taller then his knees.

"So...
1111122.title: A Growth Quirk

11113.content: What will Shunko do now that he has Deku's sexy adorable feet in his lap.
11113.title: ...places the feet on his lap.

112.content: The fiery, and sweaty, hot-tempered Bakugo. Will it be a fellow student playing with his feet, or your own character?
112.title: Katsuki 'Kacchan' Bakugo

115.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: Let's try it, sounds like fun!
115.content: How about genderbended versions of the female students. For you know...something different.
115.title: Something different

1151.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
1151.title: Let's try it, sounds like fun!

11511.content:
[in this version of the story, female characters we know are genderbended and are fem-boys]

Class 1-A was created just today and surprisingly all of it's students were boys this year though you could only tell that if you were a teacher with the class' record, almost one third of the students very girly looking boys and it was almost impossible to guess their gender. Among those girly boys: Mina Ashido, a pink skinned boy with pink hair who can secrete acid from any part of his body.

Most of time he uses his bare feet in combination with this quirk to litteraly slide on the ground.

Though the class was created a few hours ago, Mina seemed rather popular with his comrades who seem to appreciate his joyful personality. Though almost all of them were thinking he was a girl. During a pause, Mina started to train his technique alone and removed his shoes and socks tin order to do so. Someone was watching his training Either for an interest for his feet or because of curiosity it's up to you to decide. Who was watching?
11511.title: Mina ashido

115112.content: Then who was watching Mina's training?
115112.title: another person

11513.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
11513.title: Other?

info.brief_description: Interactive story for the male characters of the popular anime My Hero Academia.
info.description:
Just a simple interactive story, meant for having fun with the feet of guy characters from the show.
Either take control as another hero/upcoming hero/character, or use a completely new character.

Main point of this story is just to have fun. Foot play should be a part of the story, but feel free to involve sexual activities and other kinks.

Only guy characters feet, and sex should only be done with guys. Girls are allowed, but only if they are playing with another guy's feet.
